page.title: 05Trade In Inverbervie Area
page.content: Those living in our D block are served by a variety of shops and businesses. Food shops include the Co-op, Spar, V.G., Kondits bakery, Crofters the confectioners and two butchers. The chip shop is a favourite place for passing motorists. There is also a chemist, a draper, a post office, a newsagent, an ironmonger, electrical shop and an off-licence. We are also served by various tradesmen - builders, plumbers, joiners, electricians and a garage and filling station are available for motorists. When our money runs out we can go to either the T.S.B. or the Clydesdale bank! Two days a week people can travel free of charge by bus to Fine Fare Supermarket in Montrose.
